eheth parani wanithawa sathuwa, bududahamin poshanaya wi thibu duradarshibhawaya, anathuraka seyawa daka ganime wibhawathawa, daksha bawa, analas bawa aadi gunanga nuthana bauddha wanithawa thulin gilihi yanne kawaraku nisadayi gambaurin sitha baliya yuthuwa atha.thama kusin bihi kala aadaraniya daruwan samanga siya diwi nasa ganna mawuwarun daruwan maha manga dama yana mawuwarun sallalayanata kisidu hethuwak nomathiwa biliwana naganiyan, aniyam asurata lol karana swami diyaniyan, itha labala wiyedima gabsawanta lakwana pasal soyuriyan, thama pemwathunta nirlobhiwa thaman sathu watinama de dan di awasanaye siya diwi nasa ganna pe්ramawanthiyan me bodu wanitha samajaya thula nirmanaya wi aththe, kumak heyin dayi wimasa baliya yuthu ya.parani bodu wanithawa budu dahamin ukaha gath adhyathmika shakthiya, paurusha lakshana, iwasa dara ganime hakiya nuthana wanithawa thulin gilihi yannata aarambha wi thibima mulika karunak se mehidi penwa diya haki ya.ada wanithawa bauddha paurusha sadhaka wenuwata batahira sanskruthika sadhaka ukaha ganimin sitinniya.
